headline: NRG Energy, LandBridge Partner to Explore 1,100 MW Data Center Power Site in Reeves County, Texas
summary: NRG Energy Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of the most undervalued stocks to buy and hold for 5 years. On September 23, LandBridge Company LLC (NYSE:LB) announced that it has entered into a strategic agreement with NRG Energy regarding a potential data center site in Reeves County, Texas, located in the Delaware Basin. The collaboration is a […]
